definition: ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: Combined with the well-known institutions, the Department of labor and personnel departments cooperation in running schools.
sentences.chinese: 联合各知名院校，各劳动部门和人事部门合作办学。

sentences.english: That person  personally  persuaded the personnel with persuasive words.
sentences.chinese: 那个人用有说服力的话亲自说服了人事部门。

sentences.english: Well, I have been the director of personnel at Wang’s Lumber for the last five years.
sentences.chinese: 我过去5年在王氏木材公司的人事部门任主管。

sentences.english: But this is something you should discuss with our personnel department.
sentences.chinese: 但你最好与我们的人事部门谈论这些事情。

sentences.english: Situation：Cathy wants to transfer her post of receptionist into a personnel officer.
sentences.chinese: 凯茜想从现在的前台调到人事部门工作。

sentences.english: In SOA terms, the personnel department is a service provider.
sentences.chinese: 按SOA的术语来说，人事部门是一个服务提供者。

sentences.english: The requests for transfers were channeled through the personnel office.
sentences.chinese: 请求调动的申请书转送到了人事部门。

sentences.english: In the event of any dispute, the labor and personnel department in their locality shall adjudicate.
sentences.chinese: 如有争议，由所在地区劳动人事部门裁决。

sentences.english: The staff of IMCO shall be employed and managed by the personnel department of IMCO according to general rules.
sentences.chinese: 其他工作人员由人事部门依照层级管理的通则任用。

sentences.english: It's the duty of the human resource department to recruit and transfer talented people.
sentences.chinese: 铨选人才，合理调用是人事部门的职责。

sentences.english: Headhunting can assist your company or HR department achieve value added personnel solutions.
sentences.chinese: 猎头能帮助你公司或者人事部门解决额外人事问题。

sentences.english: The personnel department is seeking for competent persons.
sentences.chinese: 人事部门寻找有能力的人。

sentences.english: Job seekers should apply at the personnel office.
sentences.chinese: 求职者可找人事部门办公室联系。

definition: to accept a job offer/to apply for an advertised position
to hire (an employee)/to accept (a manuscript) for publication
labor contract/contract between employer and employees governing wages and conditions
